text:
Hi Steve, 
Hope this helps someone. 
Normally when I get fail to install one of the things I do that I didn’t see you
mention is restarting the services associated with updates. In addition to
renaming the software distribution folder with ren I also like to delete the
contents of %temp% files in windows from the run box going through %temp% to get
to the folder for windows temp files. 
CMD 
net stop wuauserv 
net stop bits 
ren C:\\Windows\SoftwareDistribution Softwaredistribution.old2 
net start wuauserv 
net start bits 
Thank you, 
Marcus Collins
Helpdesk Technician
Office: 619.234.5884 ext 8050
Mobile: 619.874.1375
Follow Luth Research on LinkedIn

 Follow
Luth Research on Twitter

metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] RE: Errors Installing Win11 KB5032190
